title: Software Developer / Soccer Player / Music lover
bio: Hi, I’m Ricardo. I’m Software Developer. If you are looking for anyone to build your brands and grow your business , I can help you.
available: I am currently open for part-time work.
phraseOne: Technology is neither good nor bad; it is how we use it that defines its impact. Join me on this journey to build solutions with purpose.
phraseTwo: the developer's journey on my personal page
databaseText: I have experience in SQL and NoSQL databases.
mobileText: TI have experience working with frameworks like ionic , react native and flutter
webText: I have experience making web applicacions using reactjs and angular
backendText: I have experience using frameworks like express, nestjs and spring boot
